snippet.title: Jewel Fever (Xbox-Edition) - Xbox One Gameplay
snippet.description:
"Jewel Fever" is an addictive match-3-puzzle-game!

It features:
✔ Three game modes: Normal, Quick and Infinite
✔ HD graphics
✔ steady framerates with 30 FPS on most devices
✔ Support for ARM and X86-PCs and Tablets!

Instructions:
Normal mode -
you advance to the next level when you match the required number of jewels as it´s shown in the upper part of the screen.

Quick mode -
Try to match as many jewels as you can in 60 seconds!

Infinite mode -
You have unlimited time so you won´t be surprised by any "game over"-messages

You can move the jewels by tapping/clicking at the source and then at the target-position or just swiping!

Developed by Sprakelsoft GmbH
Also released on Windows 10, Xbox 360 (Xbox Live Indie Games) and iOS

#xboxcreatorsprogram #xboxone #xbox #theforeseenarcade #jewelfever #match3
